questions.question_text: During the setup of an agile project, the product owner expressed clear interest in having features released during product development over having the product completed in one year. What should the project manager do?

choices.D: Create a reward system recognizing group contributions to get people motivated and improve performance.
choices.C: Promote a productive environment where everybody can work without interruptions from the rest of the team members.
choices.A: Facilitate sprint planning sessions with a focus on defining the minimum viable product (MVP).
choices.B: Design a set of metrics including velocity, which is a good measure of value delivered.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
By focusing on the MVP, the project manager ensures that the most valuable features are delivered early and continuously throughout the product development process. This aligns with the product owner's interest in having features released incrementally, allowing for early feedback and adjustments. Facilitating sprint planning sessions with this focus helps the team prioritize work effectively and maintain a clear direction towards delivering valuable features.

Selected Answer: A
A. Facilitate sprint planning sessions with a focus on defining the minimum viable product (MVP)

questions.question_text: During a meeting to define project scope a stakeholder tells the project manager that the main requested feature in the contract is not applicable, and this is documented in the lessons learned. What should the project manager do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The product owner plays a crucial role in agile projects by representing the stakeholders and ensuring that the team is working on the most valuable features. By collaborating with the product owner, the project manager can effectively evaluate and prioritize the requirements based on their value, feasibility, and alignment with the project's goals. This approach ensures that the initial product scope is well-defined and that the team can deliver the approved scope in a series of multiple versions.

Selected Answer: C
C. Work with the product owner to evaluate and prioritize the requirements

choices.C: Work with the product owner to evaluate and prioritize the requirements.
choices.B: Ask the lead developer to run a meeting with the stakeholders to agree on an ordered list.
choices.D: Prioritize the requirements based on the hierarchical level of the requesting stakeholders.
choices.A: Determine the expected benefits of each requirement to maximize the overall business value.

questions.question_text: A lead project manager for an agile project needs to prioritize requirements, define the scope of the initial product, and deliver the approved scope in a series of multiple versions. What should the project manager do next?

A defect is identified during user acceptance testing that could significantly impact the system's performance. The project team has advised that this defect puts the delivery date at risk.

Which risk management process should be performed?

choices.A: Perform Qualitative Risk Analysis, to assess the extent of the system performance impact
choices.B: Monitor Risks, to install system performance monitoring tools and update the risk register
choices.C: Plan Risk Responses, to outline the possible options to bypass the system performance issue
choices.D: Perform Quantitative Risk Analysis, to outline the details of the system performance issues

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
When a defect is identified that significantly impacts system performance and puts the delivery date at risk, it is crucial to develop a plan to address the issue. Planning risk responses involves identifying and evaluating potential options to mitigate or bypass the performance issue, ensuring that the project can continue to progress and meet its deadlines. This proactive step helps to manage the risk effectively and minimize its impact on the project's success.

questions.question_text:
At the start of a project, the sponsor declares that demonstrating benefits from the product will be extremely important. The project sponsor calls a meeting with the project manager and the project leadership team to discuss the best approach because the project has a high degree of uncertainty and many changes are expected.

What should the project manager propose?

choices.A: Develop requirements and designs to support a faster product release.
choices.C: Recommend an agile approach so the project can be delivered iteratively.
choices.D: Emphasize the adoption of a predictive approach to minimize ambiguity.
choices.B: Outsource development of the product to a third party with more experience.
